ac: 22, touch 11, flat-footed 21 (+6 armor, +1 deflection, +1 Dex, +5 natural, -1 size)
special_attacks: combat style (two-handed weapon), favored enemy (animals +2, humans +4)
other_gear: rhino hide, mwk composite shortbow with 20 arrows, mwk greatsword, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, 60 gp
feats: Cleave, Endurance, Improved Initiative, Iron Will, Lightning Reflexes, Power Attack, Vital Strike, Weapon Focus (greatsword)

sections.body: During Combat The hunter prefers to charge into melee to make use of his rhino hide charge bonus. If he has an advantage in the battle, he uses nonlethal attacks to capture prey alive, because live captives are more fun for him and his family. He sets his wolf companion on any spellcasters who are bothering him. If he thinks he might be slain, he mercilessly carves through his foes, focusing on killing any humans first.
sections.name: Tactics

special_qualities: favored terrain (forest +2), hunter's bond (wolf animal companion), track +3, wild empathy +3
name: Ogre Hunter
skills: Climb +15, Handle Animal +5, Intimidate +5, Perception +13, Stealth +9, Survival +8
